query:
ALTER TABLE jobs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS shareCount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emailShares INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS linkedinShares INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twitterShares INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS facebookShares INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS whatsappShares INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS linkCopies INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
